name: MONMOUTHIAN Cell Dream
description:
HELLO. YOU HAVE BEEN SELECTED FOR THE MONMOUTHIAN DREAM PROGRAM. AS A TEST SUBJECT, YOU WILL BE SUBJECTED TO THE DREAM WORLD AND BE ASKED TO REPORT ON YOUR FINDINGS.

MONMOUTHIAN Cell Dream is a Secret Santa fangame that I made for cLOUDDEAD (NO AFFILIATION WITH TRIP HOP GROUP OF SAME NAME), creator of untitled needle game. I made a game like those games, but with my own original gimmick ideas and twists. The requirement was to limit yourself to 3 screens, so this game is short. Please enjoy Monmouth.

IMPORTANT:

Please note that this game is not intended for beginners. However, included in the game is "Dreams Mode", allowing you to toggle invisibility and change rooms with ease.
